subject: Baseball
Cancer
Non-Hodgkin's Lymphoma
lead_paragraph: Farrell, the Red Sox manager, was told in August that he had non-Hodgkins lymphoma, and he missed the last six weeks of the regular season.
snippet: Farrell, the Red Sox manager, was told in August that he had non-Hodgkins lymphoma, and he missed the last six weeks of the regular season.
